data.message: Session: Build complete Decision Closure System for Duro: Shipped: (1) decision_validation artifact type with append-only history, (2) enhanced validate_decision with expected/actual/next_action fields, (3) duro_review_decision discipline installer with context pack + review template, (4) duro_review_next_decisions for habit installation, (5) duro_get_validation_history for timeline view. Validated 3 real architectural decisions. Fixed FTS extraction for new artifact types. Total: 4 commits (77708f5, ebf9df3, e317841, and earlier ca7c17f for list_unreviewed).
data.task: Session: Build complete Decision Closure System for Duro
